arts.ttl: Lees-Melou's 'superb' volley earns Brest draw against Leverkusen
arts.sum: Pierre Lees-Melou's "superb" volley earns Brest a draw against Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen as both side's perfect starts to the Champions League came to an end in Guingamp.

arts.ttl: Lees-Melou's 'superb' volley earns Brest draw against Leverkusen
arts.sum: Pierre Lees-Melou's "superb" volley earns Brest a draw against Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen as both side's perfect starts to the Champions League came to an end in Guingamp.

arts.ttl: Alonso gives bleak injury update on Adli and reacts to Brest draw
arts.sum: Speaking at a press conference after Bayer Leverkusen drew 1-1 with Stade Brest, Xabi Alonso gave a bleak update on Amine Adli, who came off injured, and shared his thoughts on the game.

arts.ttl: French club Brest frustrates Leverkusen in 1-1 draw in Champions League
arts.sum: A superb goal from Pierre Lees-Melou helped minnows Brest to a 1-1 draw with Bayer Leverkusen in their Champions League match on Wednesday, as both teams remained unbeaten. The French team played with verve throughout the second half but was unable to find the second goal that would have extended its winning streak to three matches.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Brest 1-1 Bayer Leverkusen: Pirates extend Champions League unbeaten run
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League, Round 3, 23/10/24 Brest hosted their first European powerhouse in the Champions League with Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen coming to town. The fearless Pirates took the fight…

arts.ttl: Five goalscorers to watch out for this weekend: Back Liam Delap to bag at Brentford
arts.sum: Will Maxwell has picked out five goalscorers to watch out for in the weekend's top-flight fixtures from across Europe’s top five leagues.

arts.ttl: Brest's 'magic' rise from amateur football to Champions League
arts.sum: Brest's rise from amateur football to the Champions League is "magic", but will they maintain a 100% start in Europe?

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Stade Brest
arts.sum: The team sheets for this evening's UEFA Champions League duel between defending Bundesliga champions Bayer 04 Leverkusen and Ligue 1's Stade Brest are in. Leverkusen trainer Xabi Alonso has employed a whopping eight changes to the squad he last deployed in the league. The Werkself may line up in a 4-2-3-1.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen and Bayern Munich monitoring 1.FC Köln goalkeeper Jonas Urbig
arts.sum: Sport Bild reports that Bayer Leverkusen are monitoring the situation alongside Bayern Munich surrounding 1.FC Köln goalkeeper Jonas Urbig. It has previously been reported that Urbig is not interested in renewing…

arts.ttl: Report: Bayern and Leverkusen battle for highly-rated goalkeeper
arts.sum: According to Sport Bild, FC Köln's Jonas Urbig has attracted the interest of both Bayern Munich and Bayer Leverkusen.
